com.bassintag.tekengine.object.gameobject

Class TekRotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.gameobject.TekRotation

  • public class TekRotation
extends java.lang.Object
    TekRotation.java created for TekEngine Represents a rotation, stores the angle both in degrees and radians to minimize conversions
    Since:
    04/12/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine
